thread.title: Extreme eats: Over-the-top dishes at Long Island restaurants
thread.title_full: Extreme eats: Over-the-top dishes at Long Island restaurants | Newsday

author: newsday.com
title: Extreme eats: Over-the-top dishes at Long Island restaurants
text:
Grilled cheese cheeseburger at Brixx and Barley in Long Beach and more extreme eats on Long Island. (Credit: Aaron Zebrook) 

Are you up to the challenge?
This is about going to extremes -- with food. The biggest, the hottest, the eye-popping, the kind of food that separates Iron Man from Indiana Jones, the merely courageous from the absolutely heroic, the borderline adventurer from the reckless competitor. No chicken breasts allowed.
What's deemed "extreme" always will depend on your perspective, and your...
